content: I purchased and played two games against ai, 2 player only. I lost the first and won the second. I would say it play's a lot like the real thing. My only issue was the movement of the board. It became very erratic which was very annoying and made taking actions very difficult. For a quick blast though I thought it was good

It doesn't play very much like the actual board game. Seems to me like it's rigged for the CG players to get the upper hand. Don't sign in or it keeps giving you the same things (kept giving me yellow bamboo cards but never drew yellow tiles). Game is beautiful but needs serious reworking. I uninstalled it because it made me so frustrated. It's a real shame because the actual board game is super fun!

This game is broken. Playing against the AI is impossible, especially when the game decides to only have five yellow tiles, which makes it almost impossible to complete yellow tile goals. I've played about 10 games, and so far every game I've played has had no more than five yellow tiles played even when the tile deck runs out. I even took a screenshot to show my wife so she can confirm I wasn't crazy.

Really like the game, BUT have not been able to get the online aspect working with my partner (which kind of defeats the whole purpose of buys it because we both purchased to be able to play against each other). Very frustrating, and would be grateful for any advice on how to get the online games working!

I'm really enjoying this game except for the fact that I keep getting almost the exact same starting cards when playing against npcs. And the npcs appear to get the same cards every time as well because they always perform the same set of moves each game. Also, the game doesn't recognize the difference between simply moving the map or touching it to place a tile, panda, or gardener. So sometimes it will place the piece when I try to look around. Otherwise, I've been enjoying the game so far.
When selecting where to rain, panda eat, or place tiles. I sometimes end up putting in the wrong place from zooming out or panning very frustrating.

I like the game and I bought the expansion. But I used 2 different credit Cards and now I can't share with my daughter. Have emailed asmodee but no response. Would love to have different AI difficulty level. Asmodee, please add more AI difficulty level! And respond to email!
No one to play with :( I wish there was a free trial, I was so excited to play today but after waiting hours there is no one to play online with me

The app needs either an undo button or the ability to confirm a move, I've been screwed over many times because I am trying to move the screen to see where to place the panda and it selects a spot for the panda to move. Fun game, but there is a little too much animation for my taste. Keep it simple.
Unplayable. Constantly crashes
Nice interface. Could use an undo button and the option to see the board when making certain decisions.

I don't see why this app is rated so poorly. It is a very good version of the board game with only a couple of small flaws. The gardener can be hard to find and sometimes it is not easy to see where the irrigation canals have been placed. Also you shouldn't have to click three times on a card to get it to be scored. But those are minor issues that should be easy to fix, and this is a great game either way.
The CPU plays the same way Everytime always dealt the same hand at the start of a new game

CAN I GET A REFUND? PLEASE!!! I can't play this at all. I'm a weekly boardgame players (real boardgames), and during the pandemic, bg apps is the only way i can help my thirst for it. AND THIS IS NOT HELPING! The game can't sync between IOS and Android. Every single time after an IOS player ends turn, the turn doesn't continue to the next Android players. From Android player the sync is okay to both. COME ON!!! Plus, when i force quit, i can't see my game to resume. Extremely disappointing.

I want a Refund please. SERIOUSLY! Tried several times playing online between android and iPhone and always got stuck from the first turns. This game is broken and Asmode should REFUND MY MONEY. PLEASE REFUND!
Just as much fun as the physical board game.
Amazing game, however this application is garbage. Constantly cuts out online games and won't let you rejoin.

Extremely buggy online play. Several times in game, one or more players will stop seeing others moves, and other will keep waiting for the player. You need to have a separate running call to track if everyone is connected. Starting and launching a multiplayer game is confusing. Very poorly designed app. On the other hand, the animations and graphics are very nice. Wish their development team would focus on fixing the connectivity issues also.

Was extremely excited to see Takenko in the play store. Been waiting forever. Unfortunately the online version of this game is not working at all on my Android. I contacted the developer, but never heard back. ‚òπÔ∏èüêºüë®‚Äçüåæ

Amazing adaptation of the boardgame!!! The animation and visuals are great! Great instruction and rules are available to review. Achievements are available and the AI is challenging. Controls and game interface work very well. So glad to see a digital version of this game and that it is well made! Thank you. Don't see much online play yet, but I'm sure more players will join in the future. Meanwhile offline works very well! Expansion is also available!

Update: This game has about zero replay value. After you have played it about a dozen times it just gives the exact same cards over and over again. Just repeat game after repeat game. They need to switch up the cards, dice rolls, tile draws etc. Online play is horrible and if you play the AI it plays the exact same cards and scenerios over and over. You get like 3 different games. Only r half decent advantage of the app is if youwould doing pass and play.
Online games do not work. The resume list does not show open games. Turn taking is an absolute mess.
It is a pretty great implementation of the board game. My low review score comes from constant freezing during online multiplayer. Totally unable to complete the game after one person's freezes

I cannot play online. It is NOT sending me a confirmation email and I cannot change my email address like it says when I click the "change email" button. üñïWHENEVER I PLAY WITH FREINDS IT ALWAYS MAKES IT SO I CANNOT SEE THE SCREEN. Money hungry piggies

nice but still has a game breaking bug. In some games, but not all: after finishing a turn the next player doesn't get to play his turn. The game just hangs. Edit: after 3 months it's still not fixed.
Love the game but I cannot play with friends online.

I really love playing this game, but every time I play a game, I draw the same cards. Even if I exit and start another game, that game has a set card draw too. The card draw just isn't random. And kills the fun.

Every time I play this, the exact same three cards are drawn from the piles, and the AI always does exactly the same thing. If you restart the game then then there is another set of cards that always comes up. It's a bit frustrating! Please make it random!
Pristine
Only problem with this game is there should be an info option.
Beautiful game, but for someone new to the game like me, it really needs an Undo button for accidental/uneducated button pressing
Will be awesome when they fix the connectivity issues. Terrible online play.
Black screen when starting

Like many Asmodee games, this would be great except that the online play is glitchy and barely works. The game continually kicks me (and other players ) offline for no reason making it virtually impossible to play.
If I had known there is no AI I wouldn't have purchased the app! the whole point of the digital version is not having a play group.
Great gameplay on local.

This game would get 5 stars for graphics & animations. It's a truly beautiful game and a fantastic representation. So it pains me to give it 3 stars based on a few annoyances that severely degrade gameplay. First, you can't save your game and come back to it. Second, it's overly predictable. I draw the exact same cards, in the same order, every single game. Third, you need a large screen. I'm guessing half the time because I can barely read the number counts for bamboo and player totals.

Excellent port of a really good board game! The AI is great! I love this game! Edit: great game, but had to lower the rating. Please fix the few small bugs in the game, especially the volume, which comes on loud even if the slider is all of the way to the left and I will happily raise my rating.

Def needs an undo button for moves where it makes sense. Accidental placements and moves when trying to adjust screen should be able to be undone. Otherwise happy to have this calm and soothing game on mobile.
I'm very bummed, this said it was a family library game and I can't download it to my husband's phone or tablet without paying.

Never played the board game but boy is this adaptation pretty. It plays flawlessly on my Galaxy S10. Some of the rules weren't immediately obvious so I had to look them up. I also wish there were various levels of AI. They can sometimes be hit or miss or just predictable in their choices. No games were available in the online section... not sure what's up with that. There's an expansion available in game too that I might try out soon.
Good gameplay but rife with bugs. App loses network play constantly. Also doesn't respect sound/music settings (main menu makes noise even if turned off in settings).

It physically hurts me to give this a 2 Star because I think this app is a great adaptation, but there are several things that mar the experience. First is Online Mode - it gets stuck on the other player's turn and freezes. Tried Online multiple times to no avail. Other cons are less gamebreaking: no undo option like Pandemic (the tiles/cards I understand, but it would be nice for the other options), having to hit 'OK' for each AI player's turns, no fast-forward for AI players, no session save.
I wish I could play online. The option is ther, but there are never any games available or players. It is still fun to play against AI.
Great game, animation a little slow
The board game is great. This implementation does need the undo function (for local games) and more levels of AI. Also, the achievements' status is broken.

Almpst perfect. Lovely graphics and animations. The game runs really smooth but two thng that stopped me giving it 5*. - No ability to save the game. playing a game and had to answer a call and beacuse the the game reloaded i couldnt continue. - I'm slightly colour blind, it not an issue the the physical game but on the app its very hard to tell the difference between the yellow and green bamboo (on the cards and the board)

Good game when it works. Worked on my old phone when I got a Pixel 4 as an upgrade I haven't been able to load the game. All that happens is that the icons for the various companies load. Then the loading screen briefly appears followed by a black screen. It's a shame because the game itself is a good adaptation of the board game (though an undo button would be nice). Without the above issues it's worth the price and I'd rate it at 4 stars.

Good game; flawed mobile implementation. The biggest issue is that local games aren't saved. If you leave the app (just switch, not close), the app may restart, and the previous game is lost. Obviously not great on mobile devices where a phone call can erase a game. The rules are also not well written or explained past a basic understanding. Otherwise, it's a good game with a beautiful interface.

Love this game. The graphics are beautiful and it's got a great amount of strategy. I would like to see different difficulty settings for the AI, as many other games have that option. Like another reviewer said. I think it'd be good if you didn't have to click OK every time the AI had its turn and if the animation for the AI could be sped up. Otherwise, definitely an excellent game to play!
It's a good game! It's Sad nobody online
Solid port great game üëç

Great, except for a few things. It's really annoying to have to hit "OK" for every AI player's turn. This is the main reason I didn't give 5 stars. There should be an option to automate this. There should also be an option to speed up the animation of the AI players' turns. Besides this, this app is am excellent implementation of the board game.
Really nicely done
Wont load screen just keeps going black. Help!!!

So excited that this game is out digitally now as Antoine Bauza is my favorite designer. The gameplay is fluid, intuitive, and runs buttery smooth. The app developers really outdid themselves on the physical to digital translation! One suggestion, it would be nice to hide the improvements selection screen so you could peek at the board before selecting the improvement.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback Cody! We will share this with developers. We do our best to be as faithful as possible to the original version. ;)
